description_for_human: Free online tool to decode Sri Lankan NIC numbers and extract birthday, gender, and age information.
description_for_model: A utility tool that parses Sri Lankan National Identity Card (NIC) numbers to extract encoded personal information. Supports both old format (9 digits + V/X, used before 2016) and new format (12 digits, introduced in 2016). The tool extracts: birthday (from day-of-year encoding), gender (days 1-366 = male, 501-866 = female), and calculates age. All processing is client-side for privacy - no data is stored or transmitted. Available in English, Sinhala, and Tamil.
